The average number of HBs ( n HB) computed from the ab initio MD trajectories of pure water and MgCl 2 solutions are reported in Figure 3C. We have used a set of geometric criteria where an HB between two water molecules exists if the following distance and angular criteria are satisfied: O−O distance is less than 3.5 Å, H−O distance is less than 2.5 Å, and the O−O−H angle is no more than 30°.
